# [Interview #587: TOM Signing Report - Sarayne, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=587#24)

#### Question

Does Rand sheathe the sword in the Last Battle?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You know I'm going to R.A.F.O. that!
